pageSetting.title: 个人绩效报告日志查询

attribute.value: select -1 as key, '全部' as value from pas_vt union all select 0 as key, '成功' as value from pas_vt union all select 1 as key, '失败' as value from pas_vt

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select rz.tjrq,jg.jgmc,lb.lbmc,rz.wjdh,hy.hymc,rz.cjsj, case when rz.yycj='1' then '个人绩效报告' else '机构绩效报告' end as yycj, case when rz.wjzt='0' then '成功' else '失败' end as wjzt,rz.filepath,rz.filesize from jxbg_wjscrz rz inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=rz.wjdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=cy.jgkhdxdh left join khdx_hylb lb on hy.khdxdh=lb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between lb.qsrq and lb.jsrq where 1=1 and rz.tjrq=$tjrq$ and $zt$ and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and hy.hydh not like 'XN%'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select rz.tjrq,jg.jgmc,lb.lbmc,rz.wjdh,hy.hymc,rz.cjsj, case when rz.yycj='1' then '个人绩效报告' else '机构绩效报告' end as yycj, case when rz.wjzt='0' then '成功' else '失败' end as wjzt,rz.filepath,rz.filesize from jxbg_wjscrz rz inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=rz.wjdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=cy.jgkhdxdh left join khdx_hylb lb on hy.khdxdh=lb.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between lb.qsrq and lb.jsrq where 1=1 and rz.tjrq=$tjrq$ and $zt$ and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select -1 as key, '全部' as value from pas_vt union all select 0 as key, '成功' as value from pas_vt union all select 1 as key, '失败' as value from pas_vt
